meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching televiews with my family every evening.
meanings.sent2: Many people tune in to televiews to relax after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The televiews last night were so funny; we couldn't stop laughing!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library of televiews, each memory a different channel.
meanings.sent5: The colorful televiews on the screen captivated the children's attention.

meanings.definition: Televiews (verb): to watch television programs or broadcasts
meanings.sent1: We televiews our favorite show together every Friday night.
meanings.sent2: She televiews the news every morning to stay informed.
meanings.sent3: I televiews so much that sometimes I dream in TV shows!
meanings.sent4: His eyes televiewed the world with wonder and curiosity.
meanings.sent5: Televiewing the documentary opened my eyes to a new perspective.
